publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iobn [sic] Wreittoun, and are to be sold at his shop, alitle beneath the salt Trone,

notesStmt.note: "Wight. To the Kings most excellent Maiesty" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, alitle beneath the salt Trone
